name: 莊清松
objective:
— To introduce the fundamental Concepts and Structures on spatial filter (Smart Antenna) and spatial pipe lines by using antenna array

— To introduce the fundamental principles and algorithms of Smart Antenna for source signal angle of arrival estimation and spatial interferences rejection by using array beamforming technique

— To introduce the fundamental infrastructures of Spatial Diversity and Spatial Multiplexing techniques for modern Wireless Communications
schedule:
— Fundamental of Array Signal Processing
    Week 1:  Analytical Vector and Matrix Theories 
    Week 2:  Antenna Array Infrastructures for Array Signal 
             processing
 
— Adaptive Smart Array Systems
    Week 3: Principles and Modeling of Array Beamforming
    Week 4: Techniques on Optimal Array Beamformers
    Week 5:Smart Minimum Variance Distortionless Response Beamformer
    Week 6:Smart Minimum Mean Square and Maximum Signal to Noise
           Ratio Beamformer
    Week 7: Adaptive Algorithms for Array Beamformer
    Week 8: Smart Antenna Angle of arrival Estimation using Spatial
            Spectral Technique
    Week 9: Middle Term Course Review Examination
    Week 10: Smart antenna Angle of arrival Estimation using 
             Subspace Technique
    Week 11: Broadband Smart Antenna Signal Processing

— Multiple-Input-Multiple-Output (MIMO) Array Infrastructures
   Week 12: Characteristics of Mobile Wireless Radio Channel
   Week 13:Space-Time MIMO Channel Capacity
   Week 14: Spatial Diversity Techniques for Mobile Wireless Radio 
           Link Communications
   Week 15: Spatial Multiplexing Techniques for Mobile Wireless 
          Radio Link Communications

— Smart Antenna in Practical Applications
   Week 16: Smart Antenna for MIMO-Spread Spectrum (CDMA) Mobile 
            Communication Systems 
   Week 17: Smart Antenna for MIMO-OFDM Mobile Communication Systems
   Week 18: Issues on Spatial Division Multiple Access (SDMA) 
            Technique and Updated Array Signal Processing
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignment                   30%
 Mid-Term Paper Exam                   30%
 Project Presentation or Paper Exam.   40%
materials:
— Papers on public Journals
— Introduction to Space-Time Wireless Communications, A. Paulraj, R. Nabar and D. Gore, CAMBRIDGE University Press, 2003.
—Introduction to Adaptive Array: R. Monzingo and T. Miller, John Wiley & Sons, 1980.
